addon.name: Catch-up TV & More's Jarvis Release repository

extension.name: Catch-up TV & More's Jarvis Release repository

extension.summary: Install Add-ons from Catch-up TV & More repository
extension.description: Download and install Catch-up TV & More add-on in its latest official version from the official developers repository. As soon as a new release version is published on the GitHub repository of Catch-up TV & More, this version is available in this repository. WARNING: The last major version of the plugin will no longer support Kodi 16 (Jarvis). To continue using this addon please update to (at least) Kodi 17 or contact us for more information. Thank you for your understanding.
